transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Namaste
Executive: Ji namaskar sir. Prabhat bol raha hun IndiaMART se kaise hain sir?
Customer: I am good yaar. Hello
Executive: Ji ji ya tell me. Accha ye keh raha tha sir I am fine fine sir. Ye power solution private limited se aap discuss hua tha na sir to products sir maine aapko update kara diya tha aapke sare product.
Customer: Aapne jo bola tha product sare aapne kara diye the.
Customer: usme kuch na effective nahi aaya.
Executive: Sir wo to bilkul sahi baat hai lekin dekhiye product abhi dale hain aapne dekha bhi hoga product increase kiya hoga hai na correct correct ek hi lead aaya aapke changes karne ke baad.
Customer: Sir wo thoda sa bhi product add kiya local me bhi aap bilkul visakhapatnam hi area me deal karte hain na that is from local area thoda local area me sir otherwise pan india rehta to business aur jyada lead ka flow rehta to wahi location pe ek to location ka filter lagate rahiye aap ki visakhapatnam me konsi lead hai nahi hai aur dusra aap ye try kijiye ki aap apne buyleads ko jo follow up kar rahe hain sath hi sath us par keyword wise bhi search kiya kijiye ki ha mujhe man ke chaliye aapko ye keyword ke lead chahiye to search kar liya kijiye like aap chahte hain ki mujhe solar rooftop ki chahiye ya solar installation ki chahiye wo sari cheezo ko bhi aap search karke keyword wise dalenge tab bhi kuch kuch lead dikhenge aapko.
Customer: Theek hai. Okay sir main check karke main aapko bolta hun theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai baki sir ek bar TrustSeal ka discussion kijiye sir usme generally bahut jaldi jaldi kam milega.
Customer: Theek hai main dekh soch ke aapko bolunga theek hai. Thank you.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says leads are not effective.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested location filter and keyword search.
- Executive suggested discussing TrustSeal benefits.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check and revert.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, location filter, keywords
